quotes.text: A man's growth is seen in the successive choirs of his friends
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.
quotes.author: Mortimer J. Adler

quotes.text: True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity, before it is entitled to the appellation.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The most important thing is transforming our minds, for a new way of thinking, a new outlook: we should strive to develop a new inner world.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: When we feel love and kindness toward others, it not only makes others feel loved and cared for, but it helps us also to develop inner happiness and peace.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Before preparing to improve the world, first look around your own home three times.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: In order to carry a positive action, we must develop here a positive vision.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: I seek constantly to improve my manners and graces, for they are the sugar to which all are attracted.
quotes.author: Og Mandino
